Html:
I think that it is necessary for me to implement a custom LayoutAlgorithm in order to get GraphSharp to do what I need. Any pointers for where to start or gotchas to avoid?

My application needs to display a graph which is always made up of nodes with edges only on the right or bottom. The nodes should butt up against each other and not be movable (i.e. the edges are fixed and not graphically displayed).
